segments.text: I don't have any more cash , and I have to get on another bus to get home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you have any more money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wanted some chips at lunch today , so I spent it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know.Do you have some change I can borrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know what ? I don't have any change for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you just ask the bus driver for a transfer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't have money for a transfer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know ? Go ask for a transfer . They're free .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? oh ! I'm glad you let me know .
segments.speaker: S1
